Content:
We thought a Jojo Binay presidency would be worse than a Rodrigo Duterte presidency. And we were wrong. 

So how sure are we that a Raffy Tulfo would actually be better than a Sara Duterte presidency?#Halalan2025

Name: Detective Mask 名探偵マスク
Content:
Something for PH liberals to think about:

It's 2028, and Sara Duterte & Tulfo are neck-and-neck in the prez race. Risa is a distant 3rd, but has enough votes to make Tulfo win.

Would you urge Risa to drop out like what you urged Grace Poe to do in 2016?#Halalan2025

Content:
The idea that Erwin Tulfo is the "softspoken" Tulfo is weird for me.

I remember a time when he hosted the ABS-CBN TV show "Mission X", exposing crimes while riding on a motorcycle and donning slim fit black t-shirt and pants. 

That was anything but softspoken.#Halalan2025

Name: WR Numero

Reelectionist and returning senators join Tulfo in the top 12. His brother, Ben Tulfo, joins him in top 3.
